text: The Ștefan cel Mare University of Suceava (, USV), also known as University of Suceava (), is a public university in Suceava, Romania. It was first founded in 1963 as the Institute of Pedagogy () and was officially founded in 1990. The university was named in honor of the Moldavian monarch Stephen the Great (). == Other websites == * Official website Category:1990 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in Romania Category:Colleges and universities in Romania Category:Suceava County
title: Ștefan cel Mare University of Suceava
